verbs.description: [ARG0: Chinese Vice Premier Liu He] [V: plans] [ARG1: to fly out Tuesday for talks with the U.S.] , two people familiar with the situation said , signaling progress on trade tensions after President Donald Trump offered a lifeline to beleaguered telecom equipment maker ZTE Corp.
